et a lot from them psychically but as I do all that metaphysical stuff prof=
essionally which takes up most of my time, then I was thinking that with a =

dolls.

lectronice for a few decades but I thought I'd give it a go..

 of the principles I was hoping to get some practical advise from the forum=
.
